name: CUT THE FOOD
description:
You are a cooker and have to prepare vegetables soup, cut seven vegetables of the same kind to make a soup and win points. If you're not fast enough you'll lose.

The windows .zip version might be considered as a threat by your antivirus, it's because it's not a common program, if you can't or don't want to disable your antivirus, you can use the .love version (which require to install Love2D).
